title: [Goerli] Erigon stuck at arbitrary block heights
body:
#### System information Erigon version: `erigon version 2022.04.3-alpha-057740ac` OS & Version (`uname -srvo`): `Linux 5.15.32-1-MANJARO #1 SMP PREEMPT Mon Mar 28 09:16:36 UTC 2022 GNU/Linux` Commit hash: `057740ac` #### Expected behaviour I am able to sync a Goerli node from scratch. #### Actual behaviour Erigon gets stuck at arbitrary block heights. #### Steps to reproduce the behaviour I am running Erigon like: ``` erigon --datadir= --chain goerli --prune htc \ --port=30303 --http.port=8545 --torrent.port=42069 \ --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 --ws --http \ --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon ``` Once the node is stuck, I stop it and restart the process. #### Logs
